description:
Is there anything more frustrating than having a great product or service that no one is buying?

How you find and keep customers is NOT about yelling ‘buy me now – special price!’

Most entrepreneurs are not selling the way customers want to buy.

This course will give you the competitive edge you need.

In this course you will learn about:

  • Why customers buy (or not)
  • How to make your marketing messages stand out in a noisy and crowded marketplace
  • What is the no. 1 reason which will turn your prospects into customers (and it’s not about the price)
  • How to build long-term customer loyalty
  • How to harness the power of social media promotions
  • The power of a brand and how to create and grow it to stand out from the crowd
  • The 5 steps you must take to protect your brand and products

At the end of this course you will be able to:

  • Create marketing campaigns that hit your target market with laser precision
  • Take the essential actions to build your brand and reputation
  • Have confidence that you know how to build long-term customer loyalty
  • Optimize your time and money spent on marketing campaigns

This 2-hour course is packed full of ideas and each lecture has practical exercises to build your business promotional activities from Day 1.
title: Transform Your Idea Into A Profitable Business: Part 2
